mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia Law Review 1924-1925
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Including members of the Class of 1925, Class of 1926, Class of 1927 and Class of 1928. Thomas M. Anderson, Walter L. Brown, Leonard J. Calhoun, W. Alonzo Carter, Jr., LeRoy R. Cohen, Paul H. Coleman, Edwin H. Copenhaver, Jr., William N. Ellis, Otho E. Falls, Jr., Mansfield C. Fuldner, Claude L. Gray, J. O'Dell Gregory, Robert C. Grove, Richard W. Hagan, Jr., Edwin D. Kyle, Jr., J. M. B. Lewis, Jr., Frederick J. Lotterhos, James B. Lovelace, Jr., John M. Manning, LeRoy H. Margolius, C. Venable Minor, Charles P. Nash, Nathan H. Nelson, Nathan S. Poffenbarger, George P. Raney, Jr., Clarence W. Robinson, Jr., Henry Savage, Jr., F. Virginius Watkins, W. Erskine Watkins, Bert G. Wetherby, R. Harral Whilden, F. Black Whitescarver.
